flawed_nl_solution:
When Joe added 20/100 more data points to the dataset, the data points in the dataset increased by 20/100*200 = <<20/100*200=1000/1>>1000/1 data points.
The total number of data points increased to 200+1000/1 = <<200+1000/1=1200>>1200
If he reduced the data points by 1/4 of the total data points, the data points reduced by 1/4*1200 =300
The total number of data points left in the dataset after Joe reduced the data points by 1/4 of the total data points is 1200-300= <<1200-300=900>>900
#### 900

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 1000/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
